p: Agroecosystems are used for the production of food, feed, fuel, fiber, and other harvestable goods providing human support and health [ 1]. Mexico has 196,437,500 ha, of which approximately 13% correspond to agricultural land. In 2016, 21.9 million ha were cultivated, with an agricultural production of 26,032 million tons with a value of 26,760 million dollars, which allowed the country to be ranked eleventh in the worldÂ´s crop production.
